titles.title: Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2024
Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to small company capital formation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2024
This bill increases the dollar limit of certain securities offerings exempt from registration requirements from $50 million annually to $150 million annually, adjusted in future years for inflation.
